greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of the 4 nearest neighbors of n in a spiral with positive integers.
comment: Nearby numbers on diagonals are not counted as neighbors for this sequence.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5202
Rémy Sigrist, PARI program for A214177
example: The four nearest neighbors of 2 are 1, 3, 9, 11. Their sum is a(2) = 24.
xref: Cf. A214176 (sum of the 8 nearest neighbors).
results.author: _Alex Ratushnyak_, Jul 06 2012
